Key Match Events: Marco Jansen made an unbeaten 75 off 42 balls
South Africa posted 399-7 after being put into bat
England plunged to 38-4 after 8.1 overs in their reply
England was dismissed for 170 in only 22 overs
Klaasen and Jansen toyed with England’s pace and spin to put on 151
Klaasen scored 109 in 109 balls, becoming the second quickest hundred in this tournament
Klaasen and Jansen helped South Africa plunder 143 runs in the last 10 overs in an incredible display of power hitting
South Africa scored 428-5 – the highest – against Sri Lanka in New Delhi
Post-Match Reflections: England's Jos Buttler admitted, 'It leaves us with no room for error'
England probably has to win every other game they play from here on, and that's the situation we're in'
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa's big win cements their third spot with six points
England sank to ninth in the table, tied on two points with last-place Afghanistan
Klaasen hit his first World Cup hundred, and fourth overall
Klaasen hit 12 fours and four sixes in all
Jansen enjoyed a productive day with the ball too – he picked up 2-35 in five overs
The conditions were brutal. It’s proper heat and saps the energy out of you
